Hi All,
I tried submitting a form using the following code

String url = protocol + "://" + hostname + ":" + port
+ path; 
WebRequest webRequest = new GetMethodWebRequest(url);
WebResponse webResponse =
webConversation.getResponse(webRequest);
webResponse = webConversation.getCurrentPage(); 
WebForm form =
webResponse.getFormWithName("logonForm");
form.setParameter("password", password);
form.setParameter("username", username);
response = form.submit();

where "logonForm" is the form's name in the JSP.
after submitting the logonForm page, the control goes
to Check_password_expiry.jsp page. After that it has
to go to Inbox page. But through test case i am unable
to go to Inbox page.Only i can able to reach upto
Check_password_expiry.jsp page.
So how to forward the control to Inbox page?
Pls any help.

Thanks well in advance.

Shrikant
